STUBS_TO_REVISIT.note: This index contains STUB/PLACEHOLDER values. Update these fields before production use:
fields_to_update: artifact.sha256 - Replace with actual SHA-256 checksum of trained model file
artifact.sizeBytes - Replace with actual file size in bytes
artifact.downloadUrl - Replace with real Hugging Face repository URL
dataset.commit - Replace with actual dataset version/commit hash
dataset.url - Replace with real dataset repository URL
training.repo - Replace with actual training code repository URL
training.commit - Replace with actual training code commit hash
provenance.runId - Replace with actual training run identifier
provenance.timestamp - Replace with actual training completion timestamp
provenance.metrics - Replace with real training metrics from training logs
STUBS_TO_REVISIT.how_to_update: Update this file manually or via CI pipeline after training a model. See README.md for details.
